desc: Although web standards-based websites can scale effectively―and basic CSS will give you basic results―there are considerations and obstacles that high traffic websites must face to keep your development and hosting costs to a minimum. There are many tips and tricks, as well as down-to-earth best practice information, to make sure that everything runs quickly and efficiently with the minimum amount of fuss or developer intervention. Targeted at “high traffic” websites―those receiving over 10,000 unique visitors a day―
title: Pro CSS for High Traffic Websites (Expert’s Voice in Web Design)
